traits.abilities: is lithe, agile, and graceful, but is oblivious and absentminded

personality.talent: Skilled actor and master of disguise
personality.mannerism: Looks over people's shoulders as if seeing something behind them
personality.interaction: is curious about one member of the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Slowly, at a Low pitch.
voice.quirk: soft letters are elongated ('sso, hhow arre yyou?')
